alert.note: Alert for Emery (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 30 at 6:18PM MDT until September 30 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR EASTERN EMERY COUNTY... At 618 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in the San Rafael Swell. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of slot canyons. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Upper and Lower Black Box, Black Dragon Wash, and Double Arch Canyon. This includes the following streams and drainages... Black Dragon Wash and San Rafael River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
